description:
Та өөрийн зохион байгуулах гэж байгаа хурим, үсний найр, одонгийн найр, төрсөн өдөр,
албан байгууллагын ойн баяр гэх мэт бүхий л төрлийн арга хэмжээндээ манай
аппликейшнаар дамжуулан хөтлөгч, дуучин, ерөөлч магтаалч, комедиан, дижи, бүжигчин,
хөгжимчин гэх мэт бүхий л төрлийн авьяаслаг уран бүтээлчдийг хамгийн хялбар, хурдан
хугацаанд захиалах боломжтой.

Үйлчилгээ:
   - Уран бүтээлчийн багцын саналтай танилцах
   - Уран бүтээлчийг өөрийн арга хэмжээ болох өдөр, цагт сул байгаа эсэхийг түргэн шуурхай шалгах
   - Уран бүтээлчийг захиалах
   - Хэрэв уран бүтээлч зөвшөөрсөн бол захиалгаа баталгаажуулах
   - Захиалгаа цуцлах боломж
   - Таны захиалга түр дансанд байрших бөгөөд үйлчилгээ үзүүлсний дараа уран бүтээлч рүү автоматаар шилжигддэг.

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere. Buy PC games and get the latest game and community news - while protecting your Steam account.

Shop Steam
Browse the Steam catalog of PC games from your phone. Never miss a sale again.

Steam Guard
Protect your Steam account and make sign in faster with two-factor authentication.
• Two-factor authentication to ensure you’re the only one with access to your account
• QR code sign in - Scan a QR code to sign into Steam instead of entering a password or…
• Sign in confirmation - Confirm your regular Steam sign ins with simple “approve” or “deny”

Library & Remote downloads
The new Library view makes it easy to view game content, discussions, guides, support, and more. Plus you can manage game downloads and updates to your PC from your phone.

Trade and Market Confirmations
Speed up item trades and sales by using your phone to confirm them.

Plus
• A personalized News feed based on your Library with the latest news, events, and content updates direct from publishers and game developers.
• Customizable Steam notifications: wishlist, sales, comments, trades, discussions, friend requests, and more.
• Access to the entire Steam Community - discussions, groups, guides, Market, Workshop, broadcasts, and more.
• Access to your friends, friend activity, groups, screenshots, inventory, wallet, and more.
• Authorized Devices - Manage access to the devices your account has signed in
• An improved Store browsing experience for mobile screens
• Support for using multiple Steam accounts in the app
• Support for customizing your app's main tabs

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Please note that the App Privacy information applies to information collected through the Netflix iOS, iPadOS and tvOS apps. See the Netflix Privacy Statement (link below) to learn more about information we collect in other contexts, including account registration.

Давуу талууд:
 - Нэг төлөөд сарын турш үзэх хязгааргүй үзэх 
 - Аман болон хадмал дуу оруулгыг контент үзэж байхдаа хүссэнээрээ тохируулах
 - Гадаад, монголын бүх сувгийг шууд болон 96 цагаар нөхөж үзэх
- Киногоо татаж, интернэтгүй үед ч үзэх
 - Насны хязгаартай кино түгжигдсэн тул бяцхан үзэгчид маань зөвхөн өөрт тохирсон контентоо үзэх
 - Бүх контент оюуны өмчийн онцгой эрхтэй

With VOO, you can access a vast library of both foreign and domestic content on the go, all with official rights and copyright. Whether you're at home or on the move, as long as you're connected to the Internet, VOO brings entertainment to your fingertips.

Why Choose VOO?

- Exclusive Originals: Enjoy VOO Original contents, available only on VOO.

- VOO Cinema: Watch the latest blockbuster movies and premium content with VOO Cinema. We continuously update our catalog with the newest releases from both Mongolian and international cinemas.

Stay connected to your favorite entertainment with VOO, where the latest and greatest content is always just a click away.

- Stream your favorite shows and movies in HD quality, no matter where you are.
- Discover new content based on your viewing preferences and what's trending in the app.

So what are you waiting for? Download our app now and start watching the best short movies, TV series, and drama today!

Анимэ гэж юу бэ? Япон соёлын томоохон хэсэг гэхэд буруудахгүй. Тэгвэл та анимэ үздэг, үзэх дуртай ч тухайн анимэныхаа тухай бүрэн мэдээллийг хайж олж чадахгүй л байна уу? Эсвэл төрөлх хэлээрээ биш болохоор дутуу ойлгож байгаан биш биз?
Тэгвэл танд Анимакс аппликэйшнг танилцуулж байна. Монголд гараад буй бүх анимэн бүрэн мэдээллийг багтаасан 

Монголын хамгийн том мэдээллийн аппликэйшн.
1. Анимэ дүрүүдийн мэдээлэл
2. Анимэ дүрүүдийн дуу оруулагчдийн мэдээлэл
3. Анимэ студиудийн мэдээлэл
4. Анимэ трайлер
5. Анимэн бүрэн мэдээлэл гэх мэтчилэн олон төрлийн мэдээлэл. Цаашлаад Монголд ямар ранктай яваа. Хүмүүсийн хамгийн хүлээлттэй байгаа гэх мэтчилэн мэдээллийг багтааж байгаа юм.

Finger Chooser: Random Finger Picker
Say goodbye to indecision with Finger Chooser, the ultimate random finger picker app for fun, fair, and fast decisions! Whether you're settling who gets the last pizza slice, picking teams, or choosing chores, this finger picker turns decisions into exciting finger games. With a simple finger touch, Choosy selects a winner, assigns tasks, or sparks laughter. Download Finger Chooser: Random Picker now for choozy fun that’s perfect for all ages!

Why Finger Chooser?
Finger Chooser (or Chozy as fans call it) is more than a random finger selector—it’s a joyful chooser for group decisions. Using advanced algorithms, this finger choose app ensures unbiased outcomes, ideal for finger games, teamwork, or daily choices. With random tap and finger surprise modes, Chwazi Finger Chooser suits everyone, offering intuitive controls and vibrant themes for a personalized choose finger experience. It’s the chooser gratuit that brings fairness and fun to every moment!

Core Features
● Finger Picker: Friends place their fingers on the screen, tap once, and the random finger picker picks a winner. Perfect for quick finger choose challenges!
● Fun Random Games:
○ Coin Toss: Flip a virtual coin for instant random chooser decisions.
○ Lucky Arrow: Spin to randomly select items with this finger selector.
○ Random Number Generator: Set ranges for lotteries or finger games.
○ Rock, Paper, Scissors: Play a quick finger touch match against the app.
● Finger Grouping: Create random teams for fair random finger sessions.
● Finger Ranking: Generate random rankings for finger game competitions.
● Themes: Pick festive or neon themes with sound effects for unique choozy fun.
● Fair & Unbiased: Algorithms ensure equal chances for every finger chooser.
● User-Friendly: Touch-based design makes choose finger easy for all ages.

Perfect for Any Occasion
● Parties: Decide who dances or brings snacks with a lively finger picker game.
● Team Games: Assign roles or first players with the random chooser.
● Chores: Fairly split tasks like cleaning with a finger touch tap.
● Workplace: Select project leaders via random tap for team harmony.
● Classrooms: Engage students by picking participants with finger surprise fun.
● Travel: Let Choosy choose your next adventure with a buzz finger tap.

Why It Shines
Finger Chooser blends simplicity and excitement. Its finger picker makes decisions effortless, while random tap and finger surprise modes add flair. Ideal for debates, game nights, or quick choices, this chozzy app saves time with customizable themes for every finger choose moment. It’s the ultimate random finger tool for fair, fun decisions!

Premium Subscription
Unlock everything with a premium plan:
● Unlimited finger chooser access
● Personalized finger game settings
● All random tap modes unlocked
● Ad-free random finger picker experience
Choose weekly or lifetime plans for a chooser gratuit upgrade.

Privacy First
Chwazi Finger Chooser never collects personal data, ensuring secure finger selector use.

Feedback Welcome
Love our random chooser? Leave a 5-star review! Suggestions? Email julianghuitong@gmail.com.

"Showbox.mn" aпп таны чөлөөт цагт зориулан төрөл бүрийн кино, контентуудыг цаг алдалгүй дуу, дүрсний өндөр түвшинд Монгол дуу оруулалт, хадмал орчуулгтайгаар хүргэх болно.
Албан ёсны эрхтэй кино контентийг Монгол дуу оруулгатай хүлээн авч үзээрэй.

WaZa нь Монгол үзэгчдэд зориулсан шинэ үеийн кино контентын стрийминг үйлчилгээ юм. Hollywood, Монгол болон дэлхийн шилдэг кино бүтээл, цуврал, онцгой контентыг хадмал эсвэл дуу оруулалттайгаар шууд хүргэнэ. Үз. Сонс. Хөгж.

Энэхүү аппликейшнээс Mr. Voodoo сувгийн VIP гишүүддээ зориулсан олон нийтэд тавигдаагүй контентуудыг үзэх боломжтой.

Кино урлагийн ид шидийг таны хурууны үзүүрт авчирна! Хамгийн сүүлийн үеийн Blockbuster-уудаас эхлээд мөнхийн сонгодог бүтээл хүртэл өргөн хүрээтэй кино, телевизийн шоуны цуглуулгыг бүгдийг нэг дороос олж мэдээрэй. Хэзээ ч, хаана ч, өөрийн сонголтод тохируулан үзээрэй.

Манай апп-ын онцлогууд:
Арвин их киноны сан: Адал явдал, драм, инээдмийн, романс, шинжлэх ухааны уран зөгнөлт гэх мэт төрөл бүрийн олон мянган бүтээлтэй танилцаарай.

Та интернетэд суурилсан үйлчилгээ болох ОРИ-д нэгдсэнээр
 ХААНА ч ХЭЗЭЭ ч оюуны өмч, зохиогчийн эрхээр баталгаажсан
 
 - Дэлхийд алдартай шоу цэнгээнт нэвтрүүлгүүд
 - Шилдэг Hollywood, Солонгос, Монгол кино контентууд
 - Сонирхолтой хөгжилтэй хүүхдийн кино, нэвтрүүлгүүд
 - Он цагийн хэлхээ түүхт бүтээлүүдийг дуу дүрсний өндөр чанартайгаар нэг дороос шимтэн үзэх боломжтой
 
 Нэг төлөөд хүссэн бүхнээ үзэх боломжит ОРИ үйлчилгээнд тавтай морил.

Hey there, little artists! Ever wanted to make cool pictures come to life with a swipe of your finger? In the Satisfying Coloring Games, it's easy-peasy!
Just follow the dotted lines like magic flag coloring and watch your blank canvas burst with colors like a rainbow explosion of flag color in ASMR coloring! We made it super simple so you can color and play without any stress in the Color Page Drawing Games. Oops, make a mistake? No worries! Just ta-da! You can erase everything and start fresh.

Satisfying Coloring You'll Love:
Expansive Coloring Library: Discover world country flags of amazing and easy Satisfying Coloring.
Rich Color Palette: Express yourself with vast colors at your fingertips in Satisfying Coloring
Relaxing ASMR Experience: Enjoy soothing sounds and textures. Like a real drawing book experience.
Interface: Enjoy effortless coloring and drawing with ease.
Some Bonus Levels:
After you've done some drawing, the Satisfying Coloring Games offers some challenging coloring levels that you'll love to play! But remember, don't get too caught up in the challenges because there are even more exciting drawings waiting for you to explore!

- Интернеттэй холбогдоод хаана ч олон төхөөрөмжөөр үзнэ

- Хамгийн олон сувагтай ОТТ үйлчилгээ, 96 цаг нөхөж үзэх боломж
- Холливүүд, Монгол, Солонгос шилдэг шинэ контентууд
- Багц бүрд дагалдах төлбөргүй үзэх 3000+ контентууд

Chicks Laugh is the ultimate app for lighthearted entertainment — perfect for family gatherings, parties, or just a good laugh alone.

Your personal chicken mascot is here to make you smile, delivering endless jokes crafted with the help of artificial intelligence. You can generate random jokes or create your own themes — the chicken adapts to your humor!

The app also includes a fun quiz mode, where you can test your knowledge about chickens, nature, and fun facts. With multiple difficulty levels and achievements, it’s a challenge you’ll actually enjoy!

Key features:

AI-powered joke generator

Set your own joke themes

Funny and unique chicken mascot

Quiz with difficulty levels and score tracking

Save your favorite jokes to the history tab

Simple, minimal, and joyful design

Whether you’re with friends or just want to brighten your day, Chicks Laugh guarantees a smile every time you open it.

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

Энэхүү аппликейшн нь Ази контент тэр дундаа Солонгос, Япон, Хятад цуврал, Нэвтрүүлэг, Кино контентыг цаг алдалгүй үзэх боломжыг олгох платформ юм. Танд хүссэн интернэт сүлжээг ашиглан хаанаас ч үзэх, боломжийг олгож байна. Ингэснээр та компьютер, таблет, гар утас зэрэг ухаалаг төхөөрөмжүүд ашиглан гадуур явах үедээ, ажил дээрээ, мөн гадаадад сурч, ажиллаж амьдарч, аялж явах үедээ ч байршил харгалзахгүй ашиглах боломжтой.

Wemax Platform гэж юу вэ?
Та өөрийн орчуулсан нэвтрүүлэг, хичээл, өөрийн хийсэн контентоо байршуулах боломжтой үйлчилгээ юм.
Мэдээж хэрэглэгч та өөрийн хүссэн контентоо үзэх, хадгалах, сануулга үүсгэж мэдэгдэл авах боломжтой.

Бид танд:
1. Гацахгүй өндөр хурдны холболт
2. Бүхнийг багтаасан цогц үйлчилгээ
3. Байнгын ажиллагаа.
88 Films аппликейшн олон төрлийн кино, телевизийн цуврал, шоу зэрэг оюуны өмчийн өмчийн албан ёсны эрхтэй контентуудтай. Дуртай контентоо үзэж тав тухыг мэдрээрэй.

Having a hard time deciding something? Let us help you decide in a fun way! 

Spin The Wheel - Random Picker is an ultimate decision making fortune wheel app where you can create countless custom wheels of fortune, add as many customized labels as you want and spin away! 

Put anything you want on the wheel and make unique raffle pickers, random name pickers to draw names of prize winners, create your own spinner games which are much more fun than just flipping a coin or make unlimited lucky wheels to help you answer such questions as What should I do? Where should I eat? Where should I go? Make your decisions in a fun way!

Some of the many great features you get for free:
> Chatrooms! Chat with other people who are currently spinning the same wheel of fortune as you and see their spin results.
> Premade presets to easily create beautiful spinner wheels
> A wheel store with hundreds of user-made wheels
> Unlimited wheels of fortune
> Unlimited labels on every wheel
> Customizable text and background of each label, choosing from dozens of colors
> Easily share your wheels and spin results with friends
> Quickly disable and re-enable wheel labels as needed
> Random result every time, no matter how hard the wheel was spun

If you want to have fun doing your raffle, giveaway or picking random name for a game then this app is exactly what you want to have!

In the Spin The Wheel - Random Picker the result is mathematically calculated and chosen randomly every time you spin the wheel, no matter how hard or easy the wheel was spun.
